text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion specifically requires that the KPI for the **Transfer Pricing Compliance** control measures the variation of the applied royalty rate from the benchmarked interquartile range. The candidate response includes a control point (Control 3: Intra-Group Pricing Benchmarking) which relates to TP, but its KPI is: '% of material intra-group transactions with TP documentation updated within 30 days of execution (target: 100%)'. This KPI measures documentation timeliness, not the variation of the applied royalty rate against the interquartile range, thus failing to meet the specific requirement of the rubric criterion.", "criterion_id": "4be62fa6-8997-4d2c-bb9a-5ff5df0ead58"}
